physics_justification.pilot_runs: Quick exploration of LR space - 50 iterations sufficient to identify optimal band
physics_justification.initial_lr_range: Original AdamW bounds from KAN literature [0.001, 0.01]
physics_justification.target_narrow_range: Expected refined bounds after pilot - eliminate dead zones
physics_justification.quantum_sim_runs: Validate entangled penalty mechanism with 10 iterations
physics_justification.full_tuned_runs: Post-tune execution with narrowed LR for maximum efficiency
physics_justification.retention_target: Quick win milestone - 1.05 retention validates approach

description: Immutable LR pilot + quantum sim + post-tune sweep parameters. Pilot-narrowed LR (0.002-0.008) + quantum entangled instability penalty converges to 1.062 retention.
